OUR GUARANTEE ON ALL FINANCED VEHICLES SOLD:

1.	101 Multi point check by AA/DEKRA

3.	Battery check by regional battery fitment centre
4.	Roadworthy certificate
5.	1 YEAR WARRANTY AVAILABLE Finance is available.

We also offer same day sales transaction and a nationwide business service subject to terms and conditions. Bank finance available and Trade-ins are welcome. Please Call one of our professional sales executives for assistance.

attributes.description:
It's Here - The charming 2021 Ford Figo Freestyle 1.5Ti VCT TREND 5dr has a lot going for it. It offers Android Auto and Apple Carplay compatibility, Bluetooth handsfree telephony and audio streaming, as well as a pair of USB ports, which are conveniently illuminated. The SYNC touchscreen offers crisp graphics and its menu system is very intuitive. With your smartphone plugged in, you gain access to music streaming- as well as navigation services, such as Google Maps.
The 1.5 Titanium comes fully loaded with interior features. There are automatic headlights and -wipers, climate control, as well as keyless start. 
In terms of safety, the Figo Freestyle 1.5 Titanium comes with 6 airbags and ABS brakes. FEATURES Include: Airbags, Aircon, Alloy Wheels, Central Locking, Electric Mirrors& Windows, Fog Lights, PDC, Radio/CD/Mp3 player with USB port, Bluetooth.
With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report you will have total peace of mind driving this vehicle. Price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.title: 2017 BMW 3 Series 320i Auto

attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.
